Ok, I commented before - but I'm commenting now after watching this. First of all, it was wonderful quality. Secondly, one scene in particular irrevocably wrecked my soul for all of time - (*cough* newborn* cough*) The end was predictable in some ways, in some ways I knew it was going to happen. It didn't bring on nausea like one user said - as a lover of shock flicks I found "titicut follies" (google if you don't know it) to be 100% more distubing because it's based on real events, real people are filmed :( My heart bled watching that - so cathartic I felt it.
If a person is going to have something like this in the collection "August Underground" is required viewing. It's bad, real bad.
